proj1.title: CookBot
proj1.skills: Python, Java, YOLOv12, Ultralitics, PyTorch, TFLite, Android Studio, SQLite, Pandas, Matplotlib, Jupyter Lab
proj1.description:
• Developing a mobile app that uses a YOLOv12-based computer vision model to detect ingredients from user photos and suggest personalized recipes via a custom matching algorithm.
• Trained and optimized the object detection model with a custom dataset achieving 70% accuracy, then converted and deployed it using TensorFlow Lite and ONNX to enable efficient, real-time mobile performance.
• Integrated the model into the app workflow, including real-time image capture, preprocessing (resizing, normalization), prediction, and UI display, ensuring optimized runtime and high prediction accuracy.
• Prepared and cleaned a recipe dataset (Food.com) using Python scripting with Pandas to handle missing data and normalization, and created visualizations with Matplotlib to validate data quality.
• Exploring deployment of vision model via cloud-based endpoints (e.g., Firebase Functions or GCP AI Platform). 
• Documented all stages of development, from data preparation to deployment, to support future collaboration.

proj2.title: Image Datasets Creation Tool
proj2.description:
• Built a Python-based Tkinter app that uses Selenium scripts to automate image scraping from Google sources, allowing users to generate curated datasets through a fully automated and interactive UI.
• Added multi-threading to accelerate scraping and used scripting logic to display, preview, and manage batch downloads, streamlining the entire data collection process.
• Supported curated ML dataset creation by integrating batch preview and selection into the scraping workflow.

proj3.title: Food Vision
proj3.skills: Python, TensorFlow/Keras, Numpy, Pandas, Matplotlib, TensorBoard
proj3.description:
• Developed convolutional neural network (CNN) models with TensorFlow and Keras, focusing on food image classification using EfficientNetV2 architecture.
• Applied transfer learning techniques (fine-tuning and feature extraction) with callbacks (early stopping, learning rate reduction) to optimize training performance and prevent overfitting.
• Integrated a data augmentation layer into the CNN model pipeline to enhance generalization, applying transformations such as rotation, flipping, and zoom during training.
• Evaluated model accuracy using validation sets and confusion matrices; visualized training progress (loss and accuracy) with TensorBoard and Matplotlib to monitor performance and guide model improvements.

proj4.title: Custom PC Order Service
proj4.skills: Java, Android Studio, Firebase, JUnit, Mockito
proj4.description:
• Led the development of a mobile app in Android Studio (Java) for building and customizing PC configurations.
• Integrated Firebase Database to manage real-time synchronization of user activity across distributed clients.
• Implemented unit tests with JUnit and Mockito to validate backend logic and verify Firebase database operations.

proj5.title: Smart Irrigation System
proj5.skills: Arduino IDE, C++, Soil Moisture Sensor
proj5.description:
• Built an Arduino-based irrigation system using soil moisture sensors to automate watering based on real-time data.
• Integrated sensor feedback with responsive automation logic to ensure accurate and timely irrigation.

proj6.title: Personal Portfolio Website
proj6.description:
• Designed and developed a personal portfolio website to showcase projects, experience, and technical skills using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
• Focused on responsive design, clear structure, and fast performance; planned deployment via GitHub Pages.
